description: This file defines React functional components for rendering mock charts using simple CSS-based bar and line sparkline visualizations. It contains components `BarChart` and `LineSpark` that generate visual representations from provided data, with no external charting libraries or network calls.

methods.name: BarChart({ data = [] })
methods.description: React component that renders a bar chart visualization based on input data.

methods.name: LineSpark({ points = [] })
methods.description: React component that renders a sparkline line chart based on input points.
